long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Tools Directory and Search

Discover and explore various AI tools effortlessly with the AI Tools Directory Chrome extension. This extension provides a comprehensive list of AI tools categorized for easy navigation. Whether you are looking for low-code/no-code solutions, video generation/editing tools, data analysis tools, or travel assistance, this extension has you covered.

Features:
Comprehensive AI Tools List: Access a wide range of AI tools across different categories, all neatly organized for quick browsing.
Real-time Search: Use the integrated search functionality to find tools by their names or descriptions. Just start typing in the search box, and get instant results.
Detailed Tool Information: Click on any tool to get more details, including its name, description, status (e.g., Freemium), and a direct link to its website.
Dynamic Content: The extension fetches the latest AI tools from an external JSON source, ensuring you always have up-to-date information.
User-friendly Interface: Enjoy a clean, Bootstrap-powered interface that makes navigation and search a breeze.
How to Use:
Explore Categories: Open the extension to browse AI tools categorized for your convenience.
Search for Tools: Use the search bar at the top to find specific tools by typing keywords related to their names or descriptions.
View Details: Click on any tool to see more information and visit its website for further exploration.
This extension is perfect for developers, AI enthusiasts, and anyone interested in discovering new AI tools to enhance their projects and workflows.

Installation:
Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar to open the directory.
Start exploring and searching for AI tools that fit your needs.
Stay updated with the latest and greatest in AI technology with the AI Tools Directory Chrome extension!
